Summary Note:
Gómez Fernández Rodríguez and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Madrid. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Gómez Fernández Rodríguez is a 33 year old and comes from Spain.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Gómez Fernández Rodríguez is currently widowed. He has 2 kids called Blanca and Antonia.
Education Background:
In 2010, Gómez finished his secondary school education at IES Juan Carlos I Burgos.
Gómez finished his studies at ESADE Business & Law School in 2014.
Occupation History:
Gómez Fernández Rodríguez is a 33 year old Developer from Spain.
Gómez Fernández Rodríguez launched his career as a Property Manager at Realia Business S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2015 to 2018.
He then transitioned to Inmobiliaria Colonial S.A. as a Developer, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2020 till now.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 60000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Córdoba and Salamanca, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited 1640000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2019, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
